content: To the right of the water, you'll spot the assorted stone monuments that are the titular Towers of Karma, giving the place a cemetery-like quality. A path winds through these small stone pillars, and is guarded by an assortment of Frozen Corpses, Monk Supporters, and a new enemy.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Towers of Karma'.
The content is as follows:
To the right of the water, you'll spot the assorted stone monuments that are the titular Towers of Karma, giving the place a cemetery-like quality. A path winds through these small stone pillars, and is guarded by an assortment of Frozen Corpses, Monk Supporters, and a new enemy.
